item.description:
Please RSVP!

 

Cindy Faber on Trading Options


 

Cindy Faber, instructor for TD Ameritrade, will demonstrate the advanced thinkorswim trading platform, including tools for trading without being chained to your computer.  She will also review selected trading strategies, and present ways to use options Greeks as tools to help manage risk.


Topics and tools presented will be applicable to stock traders and other derivatives traders.

Cindy Faber has nearly 20 years’ trading experience, including knowledge of strategies learned from institutional traders, market makers, and other professional traders. As a registered representative and instructor for TD Ameritrade, Cindy will be presenting ways to use the thinkorswim platform tools to help manage risk and implement trading strategies in your trading account.

 

 

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ 

To join our online discussion go to http://groups.google.com/bostonibd .  If you have a friend you talk stocks with, bring them with you! Food or drinks are not allowed in any MIT meeting room. We strongly urge each person to make his or her own decisions about investing their money. Investment ideas and recommendations made during our meetings and in our online dialogs bear no liability by anyone. This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required, but please RSVP.
item.name: Special Speakers Meeting: TD Ameritrade's Cindy Faber on Trading Options
